text: Panos Theodorou (, born 3 September 1994) is a Cypriot footballer who plays as a midfielder. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Cypriot footballers Category:Cyprus under-21 international footballers Category:Apollon Limassol FC players Category:Aris Limassol FC players Category:AEL Limassol players Category:Karmiotissa FC players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sportspeople from Limassol
title: Panos Theodorou
